mdRecord.dcterms:title: Europe, showing old and new boundaries
Hammond's map of Europe
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: C.S. Hammond & Company. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 1 map : col. ; 50 x 60 cm. on sheet 53 x 64 cm.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Variant title, "Hammond's map of Europe" printed below scale at lower left corner. [original]
Inset (separate scale): Land of the Czecho-Slovaks. [original]

SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Imperfect: torn along several old fold lines; shows evidence of being removed from paper covers. Handwritten note following title "Map used on trip to Europe by C.C.C., 1920" with locations marked on map. On another map, "Nouvelle France politique, 1919" C.C.C. is identified as Carroll C. Chowning. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Paris Peace Conference (1919-1920)--Maps
Treaty of Versailles (1919 June 28)
World War, 1914-1918--Territorial questions--Maps
Europe--Maps
